reviews.review: You have to see it in IMAX ! This had really good humor, and very tragic scenes. I think the ultimate drama in the MCU. I felt as if this was the Revenge of the Sith of this franchise

A terrific "Beginning of the end" for the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The different heroes and worlds come together beautifully, the character chemistry works most of the time, and it manages to be comedic, without feeling light hearted, cheesy, or taking away from the brooding  atmosphere. Unlike any past MCU movies, this film was unafraid to take risks, and throw the unexpected at you, which truly made it great.
Wow!  It really is good and heart wrenching all at once.  You'll laugh hard and you'll hurt deeply.  Must see.  I'll be back to see it again Saturday!

How can a geek not love what the MCU has done to bring this all togheter the way they did? The movie is more of a Thanos movie rather than a Avengets movie but the screentime each characters has is truely amazing and gets the best out of everyone. The only downside to this movie is the 2 big cliffhangers we get.
Im only giving it 2 1/2 stars. I need to see next years Avengers movie before I can tell you what I think about this one. Not quite sure how theyâ€™re gonna put Humpty Dumpty back together again.

CRITICS DONT KNOW ANYTHING!!! This WAS the most EPIC Marvel movie yet...... I wasn't ready.............. You most see this movie if you love Marvel... How Critics only gave this movie a 86% just shows how stupid and worthless they even are. This should have been rated higher than black panther. I don't know how that marvel movie was rated so high and this one lower. (if I could give 6 Stars I would)
This is a good example of how Marvel still has good stories

Wow, just wow, Infinity War is meant to be seen on the big screen, and so much to love. Can't say anything because the whole movie is basically a surprise. I can't give this enough praise. GO SEE THIS MOVIE!

*SPOILER FREE*
Just when people think that MCU fatigue could be setting in, a new Avengers film comes out and rewrites the rule book on comic book movies.
The Russo brothers certainly know how to film a great story. Evident in Winter Soldier and Civil War. Here they took on the mammoth task of not only a new Avengers movie, but including all members in the current MCU from Spiderman, Black Panther and the Guardians of the Galaxy with only a few previous members omitted, but mentioned in script.
The directors cleverly gave all the Avengers their own time to shine without having everyone fighting on screen in the same battle together. This shift really helps the film speed along without slowing the pace. The 149min runtime flies by. Anyone checking their watch has clearly wandered into the wrong film
I recommend that people who are yet to see the film should avoid anything that would spoil things. The films biggest impacts should be left for the surprise and shock you won't see coming. This is easily the best Marvel film to date. I could not recommend it anymore. 10/10
